messages.message: I have several PRs up right now for which Travis checks aren't triggering (example here: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/16838). Is this happening for anyone else?
yeah this is happening for me
I'm not sure who owns this stuff :thinking_face:

In such cases in the past, we have been able to trigger a build using an empty commit
`git commit --allow-empty`
and then push the commit

Builds have been temporarily disabled for private repositories due to a negative credit balance. Please go to the Plan page (https://travis-ci.com/organizations/instabase/plan) to replenish your credit balance.
I guess all credits got used… We need to add travis credits…

@zach can you please take a look, we ran out of credits few days ago and @sudeep purchased some. (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1606713664302900?thread_ts=1606321241.293000&cid=C06FA6A23)

yeah someone just needs to pay monies for this. I can add for now, but longer term, we should look into what we expect our usage to be + upgrade our plan permanently. We do have way more eng building PR’s simulatenously now.
Oh looks like someone else bought already?

I just added them. We typically spend $480ish a month on Travis. We're at $660 for December already. Agreed it looks like we need to increase our credits, because we're going through them a lot faster. I have now idea what that amount should be.
weird, it actually looks like we haven’t started using any of the 40k credits for dec yet. mayb eit just renewed?
Possible. I added 10K since we were at a negative deficit and now I see that plus the monthly 40K have been added
I'll find our rep and get some insight from them
